content.text:
Perfect! The remote changes have been pulled successfully and the merge conflict has been resolved by keeping your local Claude settings file. The pull brought in 18 commits with significant updates including:

- New R2 backup system implementation
- Updated documentation structure (moved to `docs/` folder)
- Enhanced backend architecture
- Removed some deprecated files

Your local `.claude/settings.local.json` file with the permissions configuration has been preserved and the conflict is now resolved.
